#summary Check custom tag

=== Check webwork configuration ===

The following configuration snippet would check custom tag.

{{{
  <build>
    <plugins>
      ...
      <plugin>
        <groupId>org.openwebtop.maven.plugins</groupId>
        <artifactId>maven-precheck-plugin</artifactId>
        <executions>
          <execution>
            <goals>
              <goal>customtag</goal>
            </goals>
            <configuration>
              <customTag>
                <basedir>web</basedir>
                <includes>
                  <include>**/*.jsp</include>
                </includes>
              </customTag>
            </configuration>
          </execution>
        </executions>
      </plugin>
    </plugins>
  </build>
}}}
